text: RT @ChrisGPackham: Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Pro…

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Hi Chris, I live in East Devon and have had problems with both the environment agency and Keir before. I’m a massive champion for wildlife and biodiversity and had a big battle with them on MY land, which is in the middle of nowhere and private!!

@AaronBell4NUL @JamesBevanEA Let’s hope @EnvAgency will act in taxpayers best interests and ensure that the costs that will incur in the cleaning up process are footed by Red Industries, its private owners, directors and investors and NOT the public purse!
